db:abstract.db:para: Describes a readback (reading back texture contents from possibly GPU-only memory) operation.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.6.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The source of the readback operation is either a QRhiTexture or the current backbuffer of the currently targeted QRhiSwapChain. When texture() is not set, the swapchain is used. Otherwise the specified QRhiTexture is treated as the source.

db:note.db:para: Textures used in readbacks must be created with QRhiTexture::UsedAsTransferSource.
Swapchains used in readbacks must be created with QRhiSwapChain::UsedAsTransferSource.

db:section.db:para: layer() and level() are only applicable when the source is a QRhiTexture.

db:note.db:para: Multisample textures cannot be read back. Readbacks are supported for multisample swapchain buffers however.
This is a RHI API with limited compatibility guarantees, see QRhi for details.

db:section.db:title: QRhiReadbackDescription::QRhiReadbackDescription(QRhiTexture *texture)
db:section.db:para: Constructs an texture readback description that specifies that level 0 of layer 0 of texture is to be read back.

db:note.db:para: texture can also be null in which case this constructor is identical to the argumentless variant.
